Detailed Description

A brush is used by all graphical methods, which fill an area. A brush has a style (Solid or Checkered) and a color.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Brush::BrushStyle
 

Defines the style of the brush.
Solid - Areas will be filled with the defined color.
Checkered - Areas will be filled with a checkered pattern.

Enumerator:
Solid 
Checkered

Sets the color of the pen to the value represented by hue, saturation and the value. Optionally an alpha-channel can be specified.

UINT8  green,

UINT8  alpha = 255
